name: Magestore
overview:
Provide Magento templates and extensions: free templates, free extensions and commercial extensions.

  • Who we are

Magestore is a website design & development company that provides e-commerce and online service solutions. We specialize in developing ecommerce solutions using Magento. We also provide offshore programming, building custom modules for Magento which help you increase your business and enhance your brand. With a strong team in e-commerce, itâ€™s really easy for us to realize your idea. Itâ€™s simple, come to us, express your thought and make a go of your business. We provide the following products and services:

- Magento technical support.
  • What we do

Creative design based on your business goals keep structure and functionalities of Magento. Our designers experienced in Magento will bring your site Magento look & feel, make your site up-to-date, friendly, attractive and pleasing. Our professional programming and development gives you best features which suit your business needs. We make your site friendly and easy to use, bring your customers comfortable to navigate the site. You already had a website, do you need our assistance? Yeah, we provide support and consulting which will help you enhance your store. Letâ€™s us take you to a new height of online business.

We ask to understand what you want. We use our knowledge to offer best choices to meet all of your objectives. We always make sure that your requirements are clear and attainable before processing. To ensure the project is delivered to your expectations, we send daily reports on all progress. We also have in-person meetings via IM or phone to go over all work in progress. What we want is hold your hand through the entire process and make sure we are on the right way.

  • Why we are different

Customer focused: We regard our customers’ success as our own. With a background deeply entrenched in consultancy, we are dedicated to ensuring that all deadlines are met on time and all results are delivered beyond expectations. We will continue to do whatever is required to ensure our customers are always 100% satisfied. Our guarantee: We promise you pleasing results and stand behind our products. You can always get our free support to enhance the performance of the site. Our communication: We believe communication is a very important factor to have a successful project. We are located in Vietnam while most of our clients are from US and EU. But itâ€™ve never caused any problem. Working with Magestore, you can believe we are always beside you and make a go of business. Professional processes: The development is achieved by a professional and standard process. We make sure that we understand exactly what clients want, give them best solutions and make an agreement. We believe a good plan is required to make project on time and successful. The project is developed by a professional developer team. We guarantee that the final product delivered has to pass our test process.
